title: Ebro In The Morning - Political Roundup with Ari Melber
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ari Melber joins Ebro in the Morning to celebrate his milestone of having the longest running 6PM show on MSNBC with his program 'The Beat with Ari Melber.'

He also discusses the latest in politics including the ongoing issues with President Joe Biden pushing forward with his agenda including the issues with the debt ceiling, police reform and the debate about the COVID-19 Vaccine. He also discusses Drake's latest album 'Certified Lover Boy', Kanye West's 'DONDA', and how many classics Drizzy has. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

description:
Ari Melber joins Ebro in the Morning to celebrate his milestone of having the longest running 6PM show on MSNBC with his program 'The Beat with Ari Melber.'

He also discusses the latest in politics including the ongoing issues with President Joe Biden pushing forward with his agenda including the issues with the debt ceiling, police reform and the debate about the COVID-19 Vaccine. He also discusses Drake's latest album 'Certified Lover Boy', Kanye West's 'DONDA', and how many classics Drizzy has.
